spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh grabs an enemy, then pull them to him or leaps to them.
He throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh grabs an enemy, then pull them to him or leaps to them. He throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds. Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it strikes an enemy. Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh creates a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to him.
Thresh throws the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up, and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh creates a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to him. Thresh throws the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up, and Thresh pulls both back to him. Additionally, the Lantern will grant a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near the Lantern.

spells.name: Flay
spells.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh deals {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit, which builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Thresh knocks nearby enemies in the direction of his choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Thresh deals {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} Magic Damage on each hit, which builds up when not attacking. This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack. Active: Thresh knocks nearby enemies in the direction of his choice. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

spells.name: The Box
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.tooltip:
Thresh traps enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
He creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Thresh traps enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken. He creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall. Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

spells.name: Dark Flight
spells.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
spells.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.sanitizedDescription: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.tooltip:
While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst.

Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst. Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health. Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

spells.name: Blades of Torment
spells.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Massacre
spells.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him. Massacre then fills Aatrox's Blood Well by {{ e7 }}% for each champion hit and grants him {{ e3 }}% attack speed and 175 attack range for 12 seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him. Massacre then fills Aatrox's Blood Well by {{ e7 }}% for each champion hit and grants him {{ e3 }}% attack speed and 175 attack range for 12 seconds.

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing. Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

spells.name: Mocking Shout
spells.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Spinning Slash
spells.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This effect is doubled against champions.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury. Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This effect is doubled against champions.

spells.name: Undying Rage
spells.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

spells.name: Barrel Roll
spells.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds (deals 70% damage to minions).

The damage and slow increases as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds (deals 70% damage to minions). The damage and slow increases as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds.

spells.name: Drunken Rage
spells.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing more damage on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing more damage on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spells.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down his brew and takes {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's maximum Health (max. {{ e4 }} against monsters) as bonus magic damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Gragas guzzles down his brew and takes {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's maximum Health (max. {{ e4 }} against monsters) as bonus magic damage.

spells.name: Body Slam
spells.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for 1 second.

Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit. He deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and bumps them back, stunning them for 1 second. Body Slam's Cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if Gragas collides with a unit.

spells.name: Explosive Cask
spells.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.tooltip: Gragas throws his cask, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back from the center.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Gragas throws his cask, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back from the center.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area after a brief delay. Enemies in the area are Poisoned, taking {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Noxious Blast hits an enemy champion, Cassiopeia gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia releases a cloud of poison, lightly damaging and slowing any enemy that happens to pass through it.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia releases a toxic cloud that grows in size over {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the cloud are Poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, causing them to take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and be slowed by {{ e2 }}%. The cloud continually reapplies this Poison to enemies within it.

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia lets loose a damaging attack at her target, increasing further Poison damage dealt to the target. If the target dies, Cassiopeia regains Mana. If the target is poisoned, the cooldown of this spell is refreshed.
spells.tooltip:
Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. If Twin Fang kills the target, Cassiopeia refunds its cost and restores {{ e10 }}% of her maximum Mana ({{ f3 }}). If the target is Poisoned, then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to her target. Hitting an enemy with Twin Fang increases Cassiopeia's Poison damage dealt to the target by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e9 }} seconds. This effect stacks up to two times.

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing attack damage plus a flat amount and 8% of her target's max Health as bonus damage. The bonus damage cannot exceed a threshold based on rank.
spells.tooltip: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) plus 8% of her target's maximum Health as Magic Damage. The base plus percent Health bonus damage cannot exceed {{ e3 }}.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) plus 8% of her target's maximum Health as Magic Damage. The base plus percent Health bonus damage cannot exceed {{ e3 }}.

spells.name: Paragon of Demacia
spells.description: Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's Armor and damage are increased for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times. Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her Movement Speed is increased for 5 seconds.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's Armor and damage are increased for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times. Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her Movement Speed is increased for 5 seconds.

spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's Armor and damage are increased by {{ e1 }} for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times. spells.name: Heroic Charge
spells.description: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them further. The initial impact deals a small amount of damage, and if they collide with terrain, her target will take a high amount of damage and be stunned.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them further. The initial impact deals a small amount of damage, and if they collide with terrain, her target will take a high amount of damage and be stunned.
spells.tooltip: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them for a short distance. The initial impact deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. If they collide with terrain, her target takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and will be stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them for a short distance. The initial impact deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. If they collide with terrain, her target takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and will be stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Diplomatic Immunity
spells.description: Poppy focuses intently on a single enemy champion, dealing increased damage to them. Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Poppy focuses intently on a single enemy champion, dealing increased damage to them. Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target.

Poppy deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the marked target.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: For {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target enemy champion. Poppy deals {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the marked target.

spells.name: Overload

spells.sanitizedDescription: Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck.

spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fires an orb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first target hit.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
spells.tooltip: Instantly roots a target for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Instantly roots a target for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Spell Flux
spells.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that bounces from the initial target to nearby enemies and Ryze before bouncing back to the initial target. Enemies hit are damaged and have their Magic Resist reduced.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that bounces from the initial target to nearby enemies and Ryze before bouncing back to the initial target. Enemies hit are damaged and have their Magic Resist reduced.
spells.tooltip:

After hitting, Spell Flux bounces to nearby enemies and Ryze (up to {{ e6 }} secondary targets) before returning to the original target. Instances of damage on the original target after the first deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Unleashes an orb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reduces the Magic Resist of its target by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. spells.name: Desperate Power
spells.description: Ryze channels immense arcane power to gain Movement Speed, Spell Vamp, and area of effect damage on his spells. He also passively gains Cooldown Reduction and increases the duration of Arcane Mastery's supercharged effect.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ryze channels immense arcane power to gain Movement Speed, Spell Vamp, and area of effect damage on his spells. He also passively gains Cooldown Reduction and increases the duration of Arcane Mastery's supercharged effect.

spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Ryze gains {{ e8 }}% Cooldown Reduction, and the duration of Arcane Mastery's supercharged effect increases to {{ e2 }} seconds. spells.name: Decimating Smash

spells.sanitizedDescription: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging and slowing all enemies that it passes through.

spells.sanitizedDescription: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his shadow slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
Each enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Enemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% but will not take additional damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Zed and his shadow slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies. Each enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds. Each enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% but will not take additional damage.

spells.name: Death Mark
spells.description: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active.
spells.tooltip:
Zed briefly becomes untargetable and spawns a shadow at his location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds.

He then dashes to target champion and marks them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of all Magic and Physical Damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active.

Reactivating Death Mark will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Zed briefly becomes untargetable and spawns a shadow at his location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. He then dashes to target champion and marks them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of all Magic and Physical Damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active. Reactivating Death Mark will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

spells.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
spells.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.sanitizedDescription: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.tooltip:
Places a Turret at target location. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Their Health increases with Heimerdinger's champion level and they shut down if he moves out of the area. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kit(s) at once.

Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} {{ f2 }} total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Aiming between Heimerdinger and the target increases the rocket spread.
